firstNightReminder: Show the role token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of whom is that role.
name: Investigator
ability: You start knowing 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

firstNightReminder: Show the role token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of whom is that role.
name: Librarian
ability: You start knowing 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider (or that zero are in play).

firstNightReminder: Show the role token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of whom is that role.
name: Washerwoman
ability: You start knowing 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player's role token.
name: Undertaker
ability: Each night*, you learn which role died by execution today.

firstNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show them one good and one evil role token; one of these is correct.
otherNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show them one good and one evil role token; one of these is correct.
name: Dreamer
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): you learn 1 good and 1 evil role, 1 of which is correct.

otherNightReminder: The Gambler points to a player, and a role on the sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.
name: Gambler
ability: Each night*, choose a player and guess their role: if you guess wrong, you die.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.
name: Innkeeper
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they cannot die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

name: Bailiff
ability: If a player is executed, the player who nominated them (if not yourself) cannot die until dawn.

name: Revenant
ability: If you die in the night and the next day you use your ghost vote on the Demon, the Demon is executed immediately after the vote concludes.

name: Hallowed
ability: If you are nominated by a Minion, they are immediately executed.

otherNightReminder: If the Sawbones has not used used their ability: The Sawbones may pick a role. If that role is not in play and there is a dead Good player, one of them is now alive and becomes that role.
name: Sawbones
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may pick a Townsfolk role. If that role is not in play, a dead Good player is resurrected as that role (if possible).

otherNightReminder: If the Bloodhound has not used their ability: The Bloodhound may pick a role besides the Bloodhound. If the Demon has an alive neighbor with that role, signal Yes; otherwise, signal No.
name: Bloodhound
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may pick a Townsfolk role (other than yourself). You learn if a Demon has an alive neighbor with that role.

name: Sleuth
ability: Once per game during the day, you may announce that you have solved the game. You must then guess a role for each alive player. If every guess is correct, your team wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Berserker did not nominate yesterday: The may die.
name: Berserker
ability: Each night*, if you didn't nominate yesterday, you might die.

name: Lush
ability: Any Good player who votes for you is drunk until dawn, even if you die.

name: Saint
ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but your ability malfunctions.

firstNightReminder: If the Hecatomb was executed yesterday: The Demon may act again.
name: Hecatomb
ability: If you are executed, the Demon may act an additional time tonight. You may register as a Demon, even while dead.

otherNightReminder: If no one was executed yesterday: The Executioner points at someone who was nominated yesterday. They die.
name: Executioner
ability: Each night*, if no one was executed yesterday, you may kill a player who was nominated.

firstNightReminder: The Provocateur points to one player, then another. The first player is then woken and told they are Mad about executing the second player.
otherNightReminder: The Provocateur points to one player, then another. The first player is then woken and told they are Mad about executing the second player.
name: Provocateur
ability: Each night*, choose two players. The first player must be Mad about executing the second player, or may be executed. You lose this ability if there are 4 or fewer alive players.

otherNightReminder: The Chemist points to a role. That role is poisoned (if in play).
name: Chemist
ability: Each night*, choose a role. Any player with that role is poisoned until dusk.

otherNightReminder: Asmodeus may either point to a player, or pick three player+role combinations. In the first case, that player dies. In the second case, any correct matches die.
name: Asmodeus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may instead choose up to 3 player+role combinations. Any correct combinations die.

firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to Xanatos for as long as they need.
otherNightReminder: Xanatos picks a player. They die.
name: Xanatos
ability: The first night, you may look at the Grimoire. Each night*, choose a player: they die.

otherNightReminder: The Tsuchigumo picks a player. If they are an Outsider and can die, signal that the Tsuchigumo may pick again. This repeats as long as the Tsuchigumo picks Outsiders that can die.
name: Tsuchigumo
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If the player chosen was an Outsider and dies, you may act again. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Keziah may pick a player. If that player did not nominate yesterday, signal no and ask Keziah to pick again. The chosen player dies.
name: Keziah
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player who nominated someone yesterday: they die, even if for some reason they could not. If were no nominations or executions yesterday, you win.
